DOC.HEADLINE: ORANGE COUNTY BRIEFLY
DOC.TEXT: Mission Energy Co. : The company ' s first power_plant in Florida begins commercial operation today , a month ahead of schedule . The plant , a 150-megawatt , gas-fired cogeneration facility in Polk County , will sell electricity to Florida Power Corp . and steam to Coca-Cola Foods and Todhunter International Inc. The plant is owned by the Auburndale Power Partners Ltd . Partnership , which is owned 50 % by Mission Energy , which will operate it through a subsidiary . Mission Energy ' s investments include 42 projects in the United States , Europe and the Asia-Pacific region . Mission Energy is an Irvine-based subsidiary of SCEcorp , which also owns Southern California Edison .
